text: Jeanne Zelasko (born October 26, 1966 in Cincinnati, Ohio) is an American journalist and sportscaster. She has worked as a reporter for Judge Joe Brown. She also worked for MLB Network. She also was a studio host MLB on FOX, a sideline reporter for BCS on Fox and NFL on Fox, and a pit reporter for NASCAR. ==Other websites== *Zelasko lands her dream job *Fox's Zelasko apologizes for referring to 'Tampa Rays' Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:American radio personalities Category:College football broadcasters Category:Journalists from Ohio Category:Major League Baseball broadcasters Category:Motorsports broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:Sportspeople from Ohio Category:Television personalities from Ohio
title: Jeanne Zelasko
